name: Moscow wasn't built in a day
name_original: Moscow wasn't built in a day
description:
Top-down «Tetris» type game where you have to fill in the whole Moscow with buildings, while leaving the Kremlin and the cathedrals untouched. Ready-to-place buildings move randomly across the map, all you have to do is press Enter to place them. Try not to build on top of existing houses though, or you will be fined!

Created by:

elizantler

hydde

GreenIcosahedron
